288a5('bum): dwa'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdig pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nang stong pa nyid med do//gal te phyi stong pa nyid la mi spyod na
288a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te phyi stong
288a7('bum): pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya bar
288b1('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te phyi stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mo sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe
288b2('bum): na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyi stong pa nyid med do//gol te
288b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
288b4('bum): spyod do//gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'om bdag
288b5('bum): mod ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
288b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyi nang stong pa nyid
288b7('bum): med do//gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes
289a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
289a2('bum): gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gol te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am
289a3('bum): mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med
289a4('bum): ba 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do//gal te chen po stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te chen
289a5('bum): bopo stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi
289a6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal
289a7('bum): te chen po stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'amo/bde ba
289b1('bum): 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chen po stong pa nyid med do//gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes//
289b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te don dam pa
289b3('bum): stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gral te don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces
289b4('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
289b5('bum): do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i don dam
289b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid med do//gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtog ces bya bar
289b7('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
290a1('bum): do//gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te 'dus byas
290a2('bum): stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtog pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug
290a3('bum): bsngal ba 'am/bdag gram bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid med do//gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod
290a4('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te
290a5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba
290a6('bum): 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi
290a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtog pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug
290b1('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do//gal te mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mtha' las 'das
290b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bad+ma zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal
290b3('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mtha' las 'ongs pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod no shes rab kyi pha rol tu
290b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag
290b5('bum): po 'am mi rtog pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtha' las 'das po stong pa nyid med do//
290b6('bum): gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi/
290b7('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te thog ma dang tha ma med po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
291a1('bum): spyod do//gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid badrug ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal
291a2('bum): te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtog pa 'am mi rtag pa
291a3('bum): 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/bdag gam bdag med pa'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do//gal te dor
291a4('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
291a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dor ba med pa
291a6('bum): stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces
291a7('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med
291b1('bum): pa'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med do//gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal
291b2('bum): te rang bzhini stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod nu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal
291b3('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
291b4('bum): spyod do//gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/
291b5('bum): bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do//gral te chos thams cad stong
291b6('bum): pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
291b7('bum): pa la spyod do//gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te chos thams cad stong
292a1('bum): pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am mi
292a2('bum): sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med
292a3('bum): phyi'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do//gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
292a4('bum): spyod do//gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
292a5('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya/
292a6('bum): dadur myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
292a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang
292b1('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do//gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba

292b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod do//gal te mi dmigs

292b5('bum): bsngal ba'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do//gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod na
292b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dngos po

293a1('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab

293a5('bum): spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar myi sbyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal
293a6('bum): te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/bde

296a1('bum): sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am//

297b1('bum): te rnam par thar pa brgyad drug ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rnam par gyur pa brgyad bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes
297b2('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
297b3('bum): gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mo rtag pa'am/bde
297b4('bum): ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa brgyad med do//gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
297b5('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug po dgu rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
297b6('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
297b7('bum): pa la spyod do//gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te
298a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug ces bya ba'am ma sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir
298a2('bum): zhe na/glang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal po'i ma/bdag gam bdeg med po 'am/sdig pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta phyi'i mthar gyis
298a3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do//gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la myi spyod nu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
298a4('bum): spyod do//gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
298a5('bum): spyod do//gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
298a6('bum): spyod de//gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdug med ces bya ba ri mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
298a7('bum): la spyod do//gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
298b1('bum): la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/bdug gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam
298b2('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa med do//gal te mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te
298b3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal
298b4('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
298b5('bum): pa la spyod do//gal te mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi
298b6('bum): rtag pa'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal bya 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngon par shes pa rnams med do//gal te ting nge
298b7('bum): 'dzin rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
299a1('bum): do//gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams
299a2('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes
299a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/badre ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am
299a4('bum): mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams med ngo //gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces
299a5('bum): bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi
299a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te gzungs kyi sgo
299a7('bum): rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba'am sdug bsngal
299b1('bum): ba'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mi spyod na
299b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
299b3('bum): gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
299b4('bum): bcu bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces
299b5('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtog pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am//
299b6('bum): sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do//gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do///
299b7('bum): gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug
300a1('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyong
300a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir
300a3('bum): zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag bram bdag med pa'am/sdug pa'am mo sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mi 'jigs pa rnams med
300a4('bum): do//gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces
300a5('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod no shes rab kyi pha rol
300a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te so so
300a7('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag po 'am mi rtag pa'am/
300b1('bum): bde ba 'am sdug bsngal dra 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'byung ba de lta bu'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med do//gral te byams pa chen
300b2('bum): po la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
300b3('bum): gal te byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod do//gal te byams pa chen po bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed
300b4('bum): ces bya bor mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te byams pa chen po sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
300b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'amya sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byams pa chen
300b6('bum): po med do//gal te snying rje chen po la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gral te snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
300b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te snying rje chen po bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te snying rje chen po bdag ces
301a1('bum): bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya ba mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te snying rje chen po sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod
301a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mo rtag pa 'amo/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa'am/sdug pa
301a3('bum): 'am mo sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po med do//gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal
301a4('bum): te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod do//gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa
301a5('bum): rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/
301a6('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi sbed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na
301a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtog pa 'am mi rtag pa'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/bdag gam bdag med pa'am/sdug
301b1('bum): pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med do//gal te thams cad shes pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal
301b2('bum): te thams cad shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug
301b3('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
301b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa
301b5('bum): 'am mi rtag po 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gamo bdag med pa'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thams cad shes pa nyid med do//gal te lam
301b6('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
301b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te lam gyi
302a1('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid bdug ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid/
302a2('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtog pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal
302a3('bum): ba 'am/bdag gram bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do//gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi
302a4('bum): spyod nu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
302a5('bum): gol te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid badri zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gral te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
302a6('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do//gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya
302a7('bum): bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med
302b1('bum): pa'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam
302b2('bum): po brgya ga gnyis pa//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/gal te gzugs yongs su mo rdzogs
302b3('bum): so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang
302b4('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshor
302b5('bum): ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa glang yin pa de tsho ro ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gol te 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes
302b6('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//dri ci'i phyir zhe na/'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod
302b7('bum): no shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'du
303a1('bum): byed yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rnam par
303a2('bum): shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par shes pa yongs su mi rdzogs pa gang yin pa de
303a3('bum): rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mig yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
303a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de migo ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
303a5('bum): dro/gal te rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rna ba ma
303a6('bum): yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te sna yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
303a7('bum): do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sna yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te lce yongs
303b1('bum): su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lce yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce ma byin no zhes byang de ltar yang
303b2('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te lus yongs su mi rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus yongs
303b3('bum): su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te yid yongs su mi rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes
303b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/yid yongs su mi rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
303b5('bum): spyod do//gal tI gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa
303b6('bum): dri gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te sgo yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
303b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sgra yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin po de sgra ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te
304a1('bum): dri yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dri yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dri ma yin
304a2('bum): no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te ri yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
304a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ro yongs su ma rdzogs pa glang yin gyi de ro ma yin n+ya zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu b+h+yon pA la spyod do//gal te rog yongs su ma rdzogs
304a4('bum): so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/reg yongs su mi rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rig ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi
304a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te chos yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos yongs su ma rdzogs
304a6('bum): pa gang yin pa de chos ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi smod nA shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes
304a7('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mig gi rnam par shes
304b1('bum): pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
304b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rna ba'i rnam par shes po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yong mi spyod na shes
304b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sna'i
304b4('bum): rnam par shes po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te lce'i
304b5('bum): rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang
304b6('bum): yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes
304b7('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin
305a1('bum): no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na
305a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/yid kyi rnam par shes po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba
305a3('bum): de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pho rol tu phyin po la spyod do//gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
305a4('bum): la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab

305a7('bum): te sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs

311b6('bum): byin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar
311b7('bum): yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
312a1('bum): de de ci'i phyir zhe na/dran pa skye bar 'azhug pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dad pa bar 'dug pa rnams ma ldan na nas bya ba de sgyur //
312a2('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed do//gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
312a3('bum): sa yang dag par slong brnas pa mas su su rdzogs pa gang smin pa de yang dag pa yong nanu ngas nga
312a4('bum): po la spyod du//gas 'phrul ni rlung pa rnams yongs su mardzogs sa sa ma spyod na shes spyod de//
312a5('bum): rnam gyi yongs su su rdzog sa pa gang yin pa phrul gyi dang rnams su yon na sa b+h+r-i dU/d+ma yang ma spyod ni zhes po la spyod do/
312a6('bum): yongs smras rdzogs sa nas sgyid dgas sbyis du byed pa spyod//de na/ rnams skyes
312a7('bum): po rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba sa song sa spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spya de// sa rnams sangs su mardzogs kyi zhes bya mi spyod ni so
312b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/stobs rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
312b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gul te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na//
312b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su mi rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
312b4('bum): do//gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'bogs pa'i
312b5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
312b6('bum): pa la spyod do//gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'phags pa'i bden
312b7('bum): pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod no shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te

313a2('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te tshad med pa rnams
313a3('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi smod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshad med pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshad med pa

313b4('bum): pa med pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon

314a3('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams

319b1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te brtson

319b3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags po zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
319b4('bum): gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
319b5('bum): gal te nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te phyi
319b6('bum): stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid
319b7('bum): chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags
320a1('bum): pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te chen po sbyong pa
320a2('bum): nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te don dam pa stong pa
320a3('bum): nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te 'dus byas stong pa
320a4('bum): nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te 'dus ma byas stong
320a5('bum): pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te mtha' las 'das
320a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid tshugs pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te thog ma
320a7('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal
320b1('bum): te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi sbyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gul
320b2('bum): te rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bor mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te chos
320b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod no shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te rang gi
320b4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te mi dmigs
320b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
320b6('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa
320b7('bum): 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa
321a1('bum): 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te dran pa nye
321a2('bum): par bzhag pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te yang
321a3('bum): dag par spong ba rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te rdzu

321a7('bum): rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te 'phags pa'i

321b5('bum): rnams chags pa'am ma tshogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad chags
321b6('bum): pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
321b7('bum): chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
322a1('bum): nyid dang mtshon ma med pa dang smon pa med pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab
322a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab
322a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi
322a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi pha
322a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes
322a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te mi 'jigs pa bzhi chagus pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes rab kyi
322a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de shes
322b1('bum): la rgyu la spyod / ba rnams pan po chags pa'as su tshugs sa byar ma spyod na nas pa la sbyin pa la spyad // zhes

326b7('bum): su 'grib pa med do//nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do//nyes pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do//rab 'byor 'ong lta ste dper na/sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa

327a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe/zhum pa dang g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol

327b1('bum): mchis so//ro ma mchis so//reg ma mchis so//chos ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//sna'i
327b2('bum): rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni mig
327b3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis
327b4('bum): so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//nem mkha' la ni mig gi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis
327b5('bum): so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bA ma mchis so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis
327b6('bum): so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni si'i khams ma mchis so//chu'i khams ma mchis so//me'i khams ma mchis so//
327b7('bum): rlung gi khams ma mchis so//nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so//rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni ma rig pa ma mchis so//'du byed ma mchis
328a1('bum): so//rnam par shes bu ma mchis so//ming dang gzugs ma mchis so//skye mched drug ma mchis so//reg pa ma mchis so//tshor ba ma mchis so//srung
328a2('bum): pa ma mchis so//len pa ma mchis so//srid pa mya mchis so//skye ba ma mchis so//rga shi ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so//
328a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so//brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
328a4('bum): pa ma mchis so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so//phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so//phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so//
328a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so//chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so//don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so//'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so//'dus ma byas stong
328a6('bum): pa nyid ma mchis so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so//rang
328a7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so//
328b1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma
328b2('bum): mchis so//yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so//dbang po rnams ma mchis so//stobs rnams ma mchis so//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
328b3('bum): ma mchis so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so//bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so//tshad med pa rnams
328b4('bum): ma mchis so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so//rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis
328b5('bum): so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ma mchis so//mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so//ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so//gzungs
328b6('bum): kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so//mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so///
328b7('bum): byams pa chen po ma mchis so//snying rje chen po ma mchis so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis
329a1('bum): so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so//dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so//rang byang chub ma mchis so//bla
329a2('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya go gsum pa//bcom ldan
329a3('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni/phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni
329a4('bum): nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos/'bad par mos/rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du/go cha 'tshal bya de dag ni nam mkha'
329a5('bum): yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing /yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad
329a6('bum): du/go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o//bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la 'deg par 'tshal
329a7('bum): de'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
329b1('bum): zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
329b2('bum): byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/bla na med pa
329b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshol ba de dag ni/dpa' bo bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o//de ci'i
329b4('bum): slad du zha na/bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'di lta ste/dper na 'dam bu'i chel lam/'od ma'i tshal lam/bu ramA shing gi che la
329b5('bum): lam/smyig ma'i tshal lam 'bras kyi zhing ngam/til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal
329b6('bum): pa'am/bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya dran las 'das kyang /bcom ldan
329b7('bum): 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa'am gang bar mi gda'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/sems can ma mchis pa dang sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/de bzhin du gal
330a1('bum): te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams grad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgra 'di lta ste/dper na 'dam du'i tshal lam/'od ma'i tshal lam/
330a2('bum): du ram shing gi tshal lom/smyig mo'i tshul lam/'bras kyi zhing ngam til gyi zhi ze bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/de bzhin gshegs pa
330a3('bum): de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /sems
330a4('bum): can gyi khrims la 'grib pa 'am gang bar mi ganga'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/sems can ma mchis pa dang /sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na//
330a5('bum): bdag 'di skad du sems can+da rnams kyi slad du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su
330a6('bum): smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing yongs su dgyel bar 'tshul bya lags zhes mchi'o//de nas dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'grags
330a7('bum): pa'ang med la/tshul khrims kyi phung po'ang yod/ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'ang yod/shes rab kyi phung po'ang yod/rnam par grol ba'i phung po'ang yod/rnam par grol ba'i
330b1('bum): ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'ang yod/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang yod/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang yod/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang yod/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang
330b2('bum): yod/rang byang chub kyang yod/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/rgyun du zhugs pa'ang yod/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang yod/phyir mi 'ong ba'ang yod//
330b3('bum): dgra bcom pa'ang yod/rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang yod//
330b4('bum): chos dkon mchog kyang yod/dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo
330b5('bum): snyam pa dang /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grang shes
330b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zub mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/do gang la brtson par byed pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smos pa/kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
330b7('bum): la bslab par somos pa de ni/nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
331a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul
331a2('bum): bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/de nas che
331a3('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang /bskang ba dang /bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang
331a4('bum): dag par rjes su mthong ngam/smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab par bya ba'o chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
331a5('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /
331a6('bum): bskyab par 'gyur ro//gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/de la mi 'amo mi ma yin pa glags 'tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par
331a7('bum): 'gyur ro//gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig
331b1('bum): par bya'o//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /bskyang bya dang /skyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha'
331b2('bum): la bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab par sems pa ste/de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing /dubo pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro//kau shr-i ka de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis sgyu ma dang //
331b3('bum): smig rgyu dang /rmi lam dang /sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang /sprul pa la bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang bskyab par nus sam/brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus
331b4('bum): so//smras pa kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang bskyab par gang sems pa
331b5('bum): de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing /dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro//kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la
331b6('bum): bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang bskyab par nus sam/brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so//smras pa kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
331b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing /dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro//
332a1('bum): kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /de bzhin nyid dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang /
332a2('bum): daskyung ba dang bsgrub par nus sam/brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so//smras pA kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
332a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing /dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro///
332a4('bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smos so//btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
332a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/rmi lam lta bu'i chos dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i chos
332a6('bum): rnams yongs su shes pa dang /de ltar yongs su shes pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su
332a7('bum): mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyu rlom sems su mi
332b1('bum): byed/smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed/
332b2('bum): mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa
332b3('bum): la rlom sems su mi byed po yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs
332b4('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlomo semasu mi byed/rmi
332b5('bum): lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do//de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/smigs
332b6('bum): rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi
332b7('bum): byed do//de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems
333a1('bum): su mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
333a2('bum): tshor ba rlom sems su mi byed/tshor bas rlom sems su mi byed/tshor ba la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed//
333a3('bum): rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do//de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed//
333a4('bum): smig rgyas rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan la rlom sems
333a5('bum): su mi byed do//de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sprul po rlom sems su mi byed/sprul
333a6('bum): pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa la rlomo sems su mi byed do//kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du
333a7('bum): shes rlom sems su mi byed/'du shes kyis rlom sems su mi byed/'du shes la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed
333b1('bum): rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu mA la rlom sems su mi byed do//de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyus rlom
333b2('bum): sems su mi byed/smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do//dri mig
333b3('bum): yor rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/
333b4('bum): sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du byed rlom sems su mi byed/'du
333b5('bum): byed kyis rlom sems su mi byed/'du byed la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed
333b6('bum): do//nga sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu mos rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do//de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/smig
333b7('bum): rgyurgya la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do//de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/
334a1('bum): mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa
334a2('bum): lnga rlom sems su mi byed do//kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa rlom sems su
334a3('bum): mi byed/rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi
334a4('bum): lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do//de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ga
334a5('bum): rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyu lnga rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi
334a6('bum): byed do//de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/mig yo ro la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas
334a7('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
334b1('bum): mig rlom sems su mi byed/mig gis rlom sems su mi byed/mig la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam
334b2('bum): la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do//de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyus rlom
334b3('bum): sems su mi byed/smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do//de mig

348b7('bum): su mi byed/ming dang gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ming dang gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi

355b6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgyu ma rlom sems
355b7('bum): su mi byed/sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do//de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi

369b2('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pA la rlom sems su mi byed do//kau shrI ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thams
369b3('bum): cad shes pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/thams cad shes pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/thams cad shes pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi
369b4('bum): byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed
369b5('bum): do//de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi
369b6('bum): byed/sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do//de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sprul pa rlom
369b7('bum): sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
370a1('bum): pA la stong pa'i tshe/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rnam sems su mi byed/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
370a2('bum): la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu mas
370a3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do//de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/smyig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgra brnyan
370a4('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do//de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/
370a5('bum): mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//kau shi ka gal te byang chub
370a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis
370a7('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom
370b1('bum): sa su myi byed do//de sgyu ma rlomasems su mi byed/sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed /sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do//de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyus rlom sems su/
370b2('bum): mi byed/smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do//de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/sgra ban+d+han la rlom sems su mi byed do//de mig yor rlom
370b3('bum): sems su mi byed /mig yor gyis rlom sems su mo byed/mig yor la ma sems su mi byed do//de sprul parlo myo sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sbrul dul
370b4('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya go lnga pa//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/stong gsum gyi stong
370b5('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri na/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /mtshe ma'i lha dang /dga' ldan gyi lha dang /'phrul dga'i lha dang /gzhan 'phrul
370b6('bum): dang byed kyi lha dang /tshangs ris kyi lha dang /tshangs m+b+ha nye phan gyi lha dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /tshangs chen gyi lha dang /snang ba'i lha dang /chung snang gi lha dang /tshang ming
370b7('bum): byung //kun snang dang ba'i lci dang /dge ba'i lha dang /chung dge'i lha dang /tshad meng dag pa'i lce dang /dge rgyas kyi lha /tsha ba'i dang /chu che'i lha nga /chang mang
371a1('bum): che ba'i lha dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /mi che ba'i lha dang /mi gdung ba'i lha dang /shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang /gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /'og min gyi lha
371a2('bum): gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing /bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/
371a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag brtul te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
371a4('bum): drang /kun snang dang bu'i lha rnams dang /dag rgyas kyi lho rnams dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lho rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus/shar phyogs
371a5('bum): kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
371a6('bum): nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'dri nyid zhu ba dang /do na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dI ba sems
371a7('bum): la snang bar gyur to//lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/shes
371b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu
371b2('bum): zhing /yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to//nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/mtshon 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba
371b3('bum): sha stag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/shes rab kyi pha
371b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing /yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to//byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'dri dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga'
371b5('bum): ba/dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /de na lha'i dbang po
371b6('bum): brgya byin gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing /yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas skyong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos
371b7('bum): ston po/mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' bo/dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di
372a1('bum): nyid zhu ba dang /de nI lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing /yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to//shar lho'i
372a2('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
372a3('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs
372a4('bum): su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba
372a5('bum): shra stag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po zab mo 'di nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol
372a6('bum): tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid
372a7('bum): mnga' ba/dge slong rab 'byer zhes bya ba sha stag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /de na lha'i
372b1('bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing /yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to//'og gri phyogs kyi sangs rgyas skyong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis
372b2('bum): chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di

372b4('bum): yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba shra stag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha

372b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'ang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/bla na
372b7('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro//gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la/
373a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang /sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
373a2('bum): chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang /rtags gang drang mtshan ma
373a3('bum): glang gis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
373a4('bum): nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'dri la rab 'byor byang chub sems
373a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi
373a6('bum): 'gyur ro//gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am bdog med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
373a7('bum): gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs bcings zhes bya
373b1('bum): ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs 'das zhes bya b.rarwa chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs
373b2('bum): da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshor brtag ces bya ba 'om mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
373b3('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur

373b6('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du shes bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya
373b7('bum): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du shes zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
374a1('bum): ro//'du shes bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du shes 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du shes ma 'ongs
374a2('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du shes da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur/
374a3('bum): ro//'du byed bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du byeng
374a4('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du byed zhi zhes bya ba 'am mo zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du byed bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol
374a5('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du byed 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du byed ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'du byed da ltar byung
374a6('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal
374a7('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces

374b3('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mig rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mig bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi

374b7('bum): rna ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rna ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag mod ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rna ba sdug ces bya ba
375a1('bum): 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rna bzhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rna ba bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol

375a6('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sna da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lce rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lce bde
375a7('bum): zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lce bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lce sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug

375b5('bum): zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lus 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lus ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lus da
375b6('bum): ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//yid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//yid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos
375b7('bum): ston par mi 'gyur ro//yid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//yid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
376a1('bum): yid zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//yid bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//yid 'das
376a2('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//yid ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//yid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs rtag ces
376a3('bum): bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ches ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am

376a5('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston paro mi 'gyur ro//gzugs 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
376a6('bum): gzugs ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston
376a7('bum): pAr mi 'gyur ro//sgra bdo zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par ma 'gyur ro//sgra bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
376b1('bum): sgyusgra sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sgra zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sgra bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar
376b2('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sgra 'dus zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sgyu ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sgra de ltar byung zhes bya bar chos smyon par mi
376b3('bum): 'gyur ro//dri rta ga ces bya ba'i ma mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//dri bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos sbyin par mi 'gyur ro//dri bdag ces
376b4('bum): bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//dri sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos sbyin par mi 'gyur ro//dri zhi zhes bya ba 'am mo'i zhes bya bar chos
