398b2('bum): bo 'am bdag med ces bya bar cho sde ston par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan
398b3('bum): lag rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar ches ston par mi 'gyur ro//
398b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag
398b5('bum): rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston por mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags
398b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan log brgyad pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med
398b7('bum): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam
399a1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes
399a2('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma
399a3('bum): 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
399a4('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
399a5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar
399a6('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba
399a7('bum): 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes
399b1('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags nga'i bden pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston
399b2('bum): par mi 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces
399b3('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes
399b4('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston
399b5('bum): par mi 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshad med pa
399b6('bum): rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshad med pa
399b7('bum): rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshad med pa
400a1('bum): rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams
400a2('bum): 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshod med pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs
400a3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes
400a4('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
400a5('bum): 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
400a6('bum): 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos
400a7('bum): ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar
400b1('bum): cho ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa brgyad rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa brgyad bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar cha
400b2('bum): snron dur mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar cho sa ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa brgyad sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos snga
400b3('bum): par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa brgyad zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa brgyad bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston
400b4('bum): par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dras zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa brgyad ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa
400b5('bum): brgyad da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mthar
400b6('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag
400b7('bum): ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi
401a1('bum): 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
401a2('bum): par 'jug pa dgu bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
401a3('bum): 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dragu ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu da ltar byung
401a4('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi
401a5('bum): 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par
401a6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
401a7('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
401b1('bum): smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bcings zhes bya ba
401b2('bum): 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
401b3('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mchitshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med
401b4('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mngon par
401b5('bum): shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi
401b6('bum): 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos
401b7('bum): ston par mi 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar
402a1('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams da ltar
402a2('bum): byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba
402a3('bum): 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams
402a4('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin
402a5('bum): rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams ma 'ongs
402a6('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams du ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag
402a7('bum): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams dade zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces
402b1('bum): bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo
402b2('bum): rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams dacings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs
402b3('bum): kyi sgo rnams 'dres zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar
402b4('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong sa bcu rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
402b5('bum): dade zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhi ni gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
402b6('bum): ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes
402b7('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
403a1('bum): stobs bcu 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin
403a2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu da lhur byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
403a3('bum): ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams 'dre zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar
403a4('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes
403a5('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar
403a6('bum): chos smyon par mi 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'ongs zhes bya bar tshos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
403a7('bum): ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am
403b1('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par
403b2('bum): rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
403b3('bum): ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
403b4('bum): 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams da lhar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
403b5('bum): ro//snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//snying
403b6('bum): rje chen po bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//snying rje
403b7('bum): chen po zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po 'das
404a1('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro///
404a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam sngo bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug
404a3('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi
404a4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par
404a5('bum): mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar
404a6('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya
404a7('bum): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//thams cad shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am
404b1('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//thams cad shes pa nyid
404b2('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//thams cad shes po nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am mo zhi zhes bya bar chos skyon par mi 'gyur ro//thams cad shes
404b3('bum): pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//thams cad shes pa nyid 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//thams cad shes pa nyid ma
404b4('bum): 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//thams cad shes pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi
404b5('bum): rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag
404b6('bum): ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa
404b7('bum): shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am mo zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
405a1('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//lam
405a2('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
405a3('bum): ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag
405a4('bum): med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston por mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad
405a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
405a6('bum): 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
405a7('bum): ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
405b1('bum): byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos ni ji ltar ston par 'gyur/ston na ci zhig ston par 'gyur/bcom
405b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam
405b3('bum): par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//'du shes shin tu rnam par dgra go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//'du byed shin tu rnam par dag go zhes
405b4('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//mgri shin tu rnam par
405b5('bum): dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//rna ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par drag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//sna shin tu rnam par dag
405b6('bum): go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//lce shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//lus shin tu rnam par dag
405b7('bum): go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//yid shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//gzugs shin tu rnam par
406a1('bum): dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//sgra shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par drug pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//dri shin
406a2('bum): tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dgu pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//ro shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos smyon par 'gyur ro//rig shin tu rnam
406a3('bum): por dag blo zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//chos shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//mig gi rnam par
406a4('bum): shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos

406a7('bum): par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go gis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//mig gi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag gnas shinan tu rnam par dag pa'i

413b1('bum): su dag pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su drag pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su dag pa'i

428a6('bum): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi
428a7('bum): nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//rna ba'i nad dang /sna'i nad dang /lce'i nad dang /lus kyi nad dang /yan lag mcheng bar mi 'gyur ro//lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro///
428b1('bum): rgas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba mi spong bas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro//de'i slad bzhin lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar
428b2('bum): 'gyur te/rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha dang sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrulo dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs
428b3('bum): lha nya phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs chen dang snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshing myed snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge bo dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge
428b4('bum): bI dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang gya nom snang ba dang /'og min
428b5('bum): gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro//gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sto pa der yang tshes brgyad dang bcu
428b6('bum): bzhi dang bco lnga dag lnga lha'i tshogs chen po 'dra bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar
428b7('bum): 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa gzhal
429a1('bum): du ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rigs kyi
429a2('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi drung bco lnga dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
429a3('bum): de ni bsod nams mang du 'phel te/bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba/tshad med pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/gzhal du med pa dpag tu med/
429a4('bum): pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o//rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
429a5('bum): rin po che ni 'di lta ste/sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o//byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang mi dang lha dbul po las
429a6('bum): yongs su grol bar byed pa'o//rgyal rigs che zhing mthu bo'i rigs 'byin pa'o//zlum ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o//khyim badrag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin
429a7('bum): pa'o//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//mtshe mo'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//
429b1('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//'phrul draga'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//changasu ris kyi
429b2('bum): lceskye ba'i skye mched 'byin po'o//chungaso lha nye phan gyi lho'i skye ba'i skye mchod 'byin pa'o//tshangs pa kun 'khor g+hi lha'i skye bo'i skye mched 'byin du'o//tshongs chen gyi lha'i skye
429b3('bum): skye mchod 'byon pa'o//snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//chung snang gi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//tshod medo snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye ched 'byin pa'o//kun
429b4('bum): snong dang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//dge ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//chung dge'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//tshad med dag pa'i lha'i skye ba'i skye
429b5('bum): mched 'byin pa'o//dge rgyas kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//tsho ba'i lha'i skyo ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//chung tsho'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//chung mod che bo'i
429b6('bum): lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//'bras bu che ba'i lha'i skye nga'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//mi che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin po'o//moM gdung bri'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin
429b7('bum): 'o|/shin tu mthong po'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//gya nom snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mche ngo 'byin pa'o//'og min gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mchod 'byin pa'o//nom
430a1('bum): mkha' mthu' yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//cung zad
430a2('bum): med pa'i skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha'o skye ba'i skye mchedada'o byin po'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i
430a3('bum): 'bras bu 'byin pa'o//lan cig phyir 'od du'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o//dgra bcom pa nyid 'byin pa'o//rang byang chub 'byir
430a4('bum): pa'o//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'o las kyi lam rgyas pa ra stan te/
430a5('bum): de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho bo rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal
430a6('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams
430a7('bum): yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yid do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
430b1('bum): yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do///
430b2('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams
430b3('bum): yod do//tshod med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha
430b4('bum): rnams yod do//gya nom sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye
430b5('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med mi no skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bros
430b6('bum): bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dag bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//bla na med pa yang dag par
430b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na/bsam gtan bzhi yod do//tshad med pa bzhi yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
431a1('bum): bani yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yod do//yang dag par spong ba bzhi yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yod do//dbang po lnga yod do//stobs
431a2('bum): yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
431a3('bum): yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bAsamya gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
431a4('bum): yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//byi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid
431a5('bum): yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
431a6('bum): yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi
431a7('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//'phags
431b1('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi yod do//bsam gtan bzhi yod do//tshad med pa bzhi yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//
431b2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms byar 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin thams cad yod do//
431b3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do//de bzhin gi shegs pa'i stobs bcu yod de//mi 'jigs pa bzhi yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yod do//byams pa chen
431b4('bum): po yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do//thams cad shes pa nyid yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa
431b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//de'ang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba
431b6('bum): rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu
431b7('bum): rtse gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
432a1('bum): lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen
432a2('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang bu'i lha rnams yod do//dge
432a3('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i
432a4('bum): lha rnams yod do//ched med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin
432a5('bum): tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam
432a6('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
432a7('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams
432b1('bum): smod do//byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//de bas na de la pha rol tu
432b2('bum): byin pa rin po che zhes bya'o//pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de lan chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs po'am/rnam par byang ba 'am/yongs su gzung
432b3('bum): bo'am dor ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar grang skye ba bram 'gag po 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba 'am yongs su gzung ba'am dor bar bya
432b4('bum): ba'i chos de lta bu med do//rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am/mi dge ba'am 'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/zag pa dang
432b5('bum): bcas pa'am zag pa med pa 'am/'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs
432b6('bum): su med do//rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang 'gro ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs
432b7('bum): su med de/rab 'byor de'i phyir ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
433a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/shes
433a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o//de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom
433a3('bum): ldan 'das rnams mngon por bsams shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang mchod pa ro bya ba'i
433a4('bum): phyir/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
433a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa 'am rnam par ston pa 'am yongs su ston pa 'am/'dzin par byed pa
433a6('bum): 'am 'byin par byed pa 'am skye bar byed pa'am 'gog par byed pa'am/kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/'grib par byed pa 'am/
433a7('bum): 'phel bar byed pa'am/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /de ltar byung bar byed pa med do//rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las
433b1('bum): 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/gnas par byed pa ma yin/gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/gnas par byed pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i khams las 'angs
433b2('bum): bar byed pa ma yin/gnas par byed pa ma yin///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya go brgyad pa//sbyin pa'i pha rol
433b3('bum): tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba mi yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/
433b4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub
433b5('bum): pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid sgrub pa mu yin/'dor ba ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba
433b6('bum): ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin+da/'dor ba ma yin/chen po stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor
433b7('bum): ba ma yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgrub
434a1('bum): pa mA yin/'dor ba ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor da ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgru pa ma yin/'dor//
434a2('bum): bam yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yan/'dor ba ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sku
434a3('bum): pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yan/'dor ba ma yin/ngo bo nyid
434a4('bum): pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/dngos po med dri'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin//
434a5('bum): 'dor nga ma yin/yang dag par spong ba rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba mi yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/dbang po rnams sgrub pa
434a6('bum): ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/stobs rnams sgrub phra ma yin/'dod ba ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/'phags bri'i lam
434a7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/bsam gtan rnams sgrub pa ma yin/jo
434b1('bum): ba ma yin/tshad med pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/rnam par thar pa
434b2('bum): rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
434b3('bum): mi med pa dang /smon pa med pa sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor
434b4('bum): ba ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams sgrub
434b5('bum): pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/byams pa chen po sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/snying rje chen
434b6('bum): po sgrub pa ma yin/'dor bya ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yan/'dor ba ma yin/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba
434b7('bum): ma yini/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa
435a1('bum): ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yani/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/rnam
435a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/'dus ma byas kyi khams
435a3('bum): sgrub pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhi no gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /chos
435a4('bum): kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas so//mngon par thugs
435a5('bum): su chud do//mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo //ston to rjod do//'grel to//rnam par 'byed do//gsal
435a6('bum): bar mdzad do//yang dag par ston to//de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bAr snang la 'khyod nas lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung ste/lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang /pad+ma
435a7('bum): dang /ku mu da dang /pun+da ri ka dang /man+da ra ba dang /man+da ra ba chen pos 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to//kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas//
435b1('bum): lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/dzam+bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
435b2('bum): gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su daskor ba'ang ma yin gcig tu bskor
435b3('bum): ba'ang ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
435b4('bum): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de
435b5('bum): gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam
435b6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sbyong ngo //brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
435b7('bum): stong ngo //tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //nang stong pa nyid nang stong
436a1('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ngo //phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
436a2('bum): kyis skyong ngo //chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis
436a3('bum): stong ngo //'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //thog ma dang tha ma
436a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa
436a5('bum): nyid kyis stong ngo //chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //mi dmigs
436a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong
436a7('bum): ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo ///
436b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag pur spyong ba rnams kyi sde stong ngo //rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo //dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong/
436b2('bum): po//stobs rnams stongs rnams kyis stong ngo //byang chud kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo //'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i
436b3('bum): lam yan lag brgyud pas stong ngo //'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo //bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo //ched
436b4('bum): med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ngo //gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //rnam par thar
436b5('bum): pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo //mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //rnam
436b6('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan mu med pa dang smon pa med pas stong ngo //mngon par shes
436b7('bum): pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo //ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo //gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo //de bzhin
437a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo //so so yang dag
437a2('bum): par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo //byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong ngo //snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi
437a3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo //lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
437a4('bum): 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo //phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo //dag bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo //rang byang
437a5('bum): chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo //lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam po shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
437a6('bum): nyid kyis stong ngo //gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
437a7('bum): tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o//de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi
437b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshung rgyu'ang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis
437b2('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra skor la chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am mi 'khor po 'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba 'am/yongs
437b3('bum): su ma mthong ba ma mchis pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am mi 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su
437b4('bum): ma mchis te/de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags
437b5('bum): so//mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so//smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags
437b6('bum): so//de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang rab tu bstan pa dang bsgragus pa dang rab tu 'god pa dang /gzhag pa dang /rnam par dbye ba dang /rnam par dgrol ba dang
437b7('bum): smos pa dang gsal bar bgyi ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsten pa de'ang
438a1('bum): sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ngo //gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so//gang sus kyang mngon du ma bkyis
438a2('bum): pa de la ni yongs su mA nga n+da las 'das pa ma mchis te/chos bstan pa 'di la gang su'ang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
438a3('bum): stong phrag brgya pa las lde'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
438a4('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom
438a5('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
438a6('bum): phyir ro//gsol paM/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dbyen pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtha'
438a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thub pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
438b1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
438b2('bum): phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i
438b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
438b4('bum): pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol
438b5('bum): pa|bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang
438b6('bum): 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchi ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin

439a1('bum): ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan
439a2('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skad cig ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/chos thams cad byang zhing
439a3('bum): zad pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dra ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis

439a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu

439b1('bum): ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams
439b2('bum): cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lamo gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

439b5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/me long gi bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
439b6('bum): phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab
439b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
440a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su
440a2('bum): med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan

440a7('bum): bcom pa'i phyir ro//gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
440b1('bum): stsal pa/rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi ga sngo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//

440b3('bum): dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsol pa/chos thams cang mnor ba yang dag pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro//gsal pa
440b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lto ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nus ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad
440b5('bum): rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rnyil tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
440b6('bum): chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin po 'di ni 'dod chag sem mAchis pa'i rol
440b7('bum): tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
441a1('bum): 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
441a2('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel
441a3('bum): ba'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

441a7('bum): pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
441b1('bum): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/

442a1('bum): pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan

442a7('bum): pa/nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom

442b6('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus des stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu byin du'o//bcom ldan 'das
442b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa
443a1('bum): nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das

443a3('bum): nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o///

443a5('bum): pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom
443a6('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas
443a7('bum): kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu byon pa'o///
443b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi

443b7('bum): bo nyid stong po nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan
