514b4('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid chad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol
514b5('bum): tudu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshod med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rang bzhin stong pa
514b6('bum): stod tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab
514b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod do//gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid tshang med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod do//gal te mi
515a1('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid chad/
515a2('bum): med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
515a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te
515a4('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams tshad mod
515a5('bum): de zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol
515a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te dbang po rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te stobs rnams tshad med
515a7('bum): do zhes bya bar momi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol
515b1('bum): tu phyin pa la smod do//gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi smod na/shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te 'phags pa'i
515b2('bum): bdon pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te bsam gtan rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab
515b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te tshod med pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms
515b4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod do//gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes
515b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do///
515b6('bum): gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal
515b7('bum): te mngon par shes pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod
516a1('bum): na/shes radab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te gzungs kyi sgo rngams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
516a2('bum): spyod do//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te mi 'jigs po bzhi tshad
516a3('bum): med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ched med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi
516a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de//gal te snying rje chen po tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres/
516a5('bum): pa bco brgyad tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te thams cad shes pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes
516a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ched med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te
516a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid tshad med do zhes bya ba mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
516b1('bum): stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya gnyis pa//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/gzugs ma yin no//tshor ba'i
516b2('bum): tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/tshor ba ma yin no//'du shes kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/'du shes ma yin no//'du byed kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/'du
516b3('bum): byed ma yin no//rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par shes pa ma yin no//mig gi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/mig ma yin no//rna ba'i
516b4('bum): tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rna ba ma yin no//sA'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/sna ma yin no/lha'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/lce ma yin no//lus kyi
516b5('bum): tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/lus ma yin no//yid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/yid ma yin no//gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/gzugs ma
516b6('bum): yin no//sgra'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/sgra ma yin no//dri'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/dri ma yin no//ro'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ro ma yin no//
516b7('bum): reg gi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/reg ma yin no//chos kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/chos ma yin no//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de
517a1('bum): ni/mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no//sna'i
517a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/lce'i rnam par
517a3('bum): shes pa ma yin no//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad
517a4('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no///
517a5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/sna'i 'dus
517a6('bum): te reg pa ma yin no//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/lce'i 'dus te reg pa mA yin no//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin
517a7('bum): pa de ni/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//mig gi 'dus te reg
517b1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa
517b2('bum): gang yin pa de ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/sna'i 'dus te reg
517b3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten gyis tshor ba ma yin no//lus
517b4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
517b5('bum): ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//so'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/sa'i kha mos ma yin
517b6('bum): no//chu'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/chu'i khams ma yin no//me'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/me'i khams ma yin no//rlung gi
517b7('bum): khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rlung gi khams ma yin no//nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/nam mkha'i khams ma yin no//rnam par
518a1('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no//ma rig pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ma rig pa
518a2('bum): mA yin no//'du byed kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/'du byed ma yin no//rnam par shes pa'i tshe de med pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par shes pa ma yin no//
518a3('bum): ming dang gzugs kyi tshod med pa gang yin pa de ni/ming dang gzugs ma yin no//skye mched drug gi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/skye mched drug ma yin no//reg
518a4('bum): pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/reg pa ma yin no//tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/tshor ba ma yin no//sred pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/sred
518a5('bum): pa ma yin no//len pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/len pa ma yin no//srid pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/srid pa ma yin no//skye ba'i tshad med pa gang
518a6('bum): yin pa de ni/skye ba ma yin no//rga shi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rga shi ma yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/sbyin pa'i
518a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//bzod pa'i pha rol
518b1('bum): tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
518b2('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin no//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
518b3('bum): tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/nang stong pa nyid ma yin no//phyi stong po nyid kyi
518b4('bum): tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad
518b5('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no//dron dam pa stong pa nyid//
518b6('bum): kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no//'dus//
518b7('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/mtha' las/
519a1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chud myed pa gang yin pa nga ni/thog ma dung tha ra med stong pa nyid ma yin no//
519a2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rang bzhin
519a3('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshang med pa gang yin pa de ni/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
519a4('bum): tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma
519a5('bum): yin no//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de
519a6('bum): ni/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//
519a7('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin
519b1('bum): pa da ni/yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no//dbang po rnams kyi
519b2('bum): nad pa gang yin pa de ni/dbang po rnams ma yin no//stobs rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/stobs rnams ma yin no//byang chub kyi yang lag rnams kyi tshad
519b3('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/'phags pa'i lam yin
519b4('bum): lag brgyud pa ma yin no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/'phags po'i bden pa rnams ma yin no//bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad
519b5('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/bsam gtan rnams ma yin no//tshad med pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/tshad med pa rnams ma yin no//gzugs med
519b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no//rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi tshad med pa
519b7('bum): gang yin pa de ni/rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin no//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/mthar gyis gnas pa'i
520a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang rgya/mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i tshad med pa gang yin
520a2('bum): pa de ni/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ma yin no//mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de
520a3('bum): ni/mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no//gzungs kyi sgo rnams
520a4('bum): kyi chud med pa gang yin pa de ni/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs
520a5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no//ma 'jigs pa bzhi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i tshad
520a6('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no//snying rje chen po'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/snying rje chen po ma yin no//sangs rgyas
520a7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no//thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad med pa
520b1('bum): gang yin pa de ni/thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no//rnam
520b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/kye ma bcom ldan 'das shes
520b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de ltar zab bo//de ltar gting dpag dka'o//de ltar rtogs par dka'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de ltar
520b4('bum): tshad ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/shes rab
520b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'jigs dngang zhing skrag par 'gyur du mchi'o//the tshom dang num nur 'tshal du mchi'o//mos par yang mi 'gyur du mchi'o//bcom ldan
520b6('bum): 'das phyir mo ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan par bgyi ste/des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
520b7('bum): zab mo 'di thos na/mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ro//the tshom dang nem nur 'tshal bar mi 'gyur te/thos nas kyang gong nas gong du mos pa dang /'dzin pa
521a1('bum): dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ro//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
521a2('bum): gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen
521a3('bum): po'i mdun du shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ba shad na/nyes pa cir 'gyur/shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/kau shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang
521a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bstan na/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/'ji gos
521a5('bum): par 'gyur/dngang bar 'gyur/skrag par 'gyur taM/phyir zlog par 'gyur ro//spong bar 'gyur ro//de ni mos par yang mi 'gyur te/kau shi ka theg pa la
521a6('bum): gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas spangs pa'i phyir de log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i
521a7('bum): las mngon par byed cing sogs pa dang /las byas pa dang /bsags pa des kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
521b1('bum): 'tshang rgya bar yang dka' ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan
521b2('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri thos na/mi 'jigs mi dadang skrag par mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam/smras pa/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems
521b3('bum): dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang /skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag
521b4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam/gnyis las mi 'da'
521b5('bum): bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du lung bstan par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/
521b6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/mi
521b7('bum): 'jigs mi dngang /skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /ji ltar bstan
522a1('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de dag ni/yun ring ngo nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyang
522a2('bum): pa'o//sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o//shA radwa ti'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de'i dpe bdag gis gsal por spongs so//dade
522a3('bum): blar gshegs pa de'i dpe bdag gis gsal bar spobs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyed kyis spobs pa skyed cig/shA radwa
522a4('bum): ti'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo'i rmi lam ni/shes ra
522a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing bsnyem gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /bzod pa sgrub pa dang /tshul khrims srung ba dang /sbyin
522a6('bum): pa yongs su gtong ba nas snying po byang chub la mchis pa'i bar du gyur na'ang /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla nA med pa yang dag por
522a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa rig par babyin bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyid kyis ma log pa zhig gis/shes rang
522b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa dang /bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /brjod pa bsgrubs pa dang /tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang /
522b2('bum): sbyin pa yongs su btang ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par
522b3('bum): rig par bgyi ba'o//bcom ldan 'das gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par gyur te/thos nas kyang 'dzin cing dri bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid pa de dag
522b4('bum): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub
522b5('bum): par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhug so shing /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o//sangs rgyas mang po la
522b6('bum): bsnyen bkur ba'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
522b7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nye bar gyur pa ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs/
523a1('bum): kyi bu mo glang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad cing 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par
523a2('bum): bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigos kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par
523a3('bum): bgyi ba dag go//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu la la 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas 'byung ba'am 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya
523a4('bum): pa dang /sum brgya pa dang /bzhi brgya pa dang /lnga brgya pa nas 'byung ba zhig mchis la de 'byung ba'i tshe/grong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /khams dang /
523a5('bum): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi snga ltas pa lang rdzi'am/phyugs rdzi'am/sa mtshams sam/bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa'am/nags tshal phun sum tshogs
523a6('bum): pa mthong ngam/de ma lags pa gzhan yang /mtshan ma gang gis grong ngam glong khyer ram/grong rdal lam/khams sam/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mchis par
523a7('bum): mngon pa'i snga ltas de lta bu dag mthong na de 'di snyam du 'gyur te/sde ltas 'di dag snang ba las na 'di nas grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam/khams sam
523b1('bum): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ni nya'o snyam ste/dbugs phyin par 'gyur zhing de la slan chad rkun po'i 'jigs pa 'am/chom po'i 'jigs pa'am/gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs
523b2('bum): pa'am/bkres pa dang skom pa'i 'jigs pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang gi tshe/shes rab
523b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad par 'gyur te/'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin
523b4('bum): du yid la bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi ba ste/ring po mi thogs par
523b5('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de slan chad nyan thos kyi
523b6('bum): sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sras 'jigs par mi bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di lta ste/shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba
523b7('bum): dang /mnyan du mchis pa de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snga ltas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//
524a1('bum): de de bzhin te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis nga dung yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus spobs pa skyed cig/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu
524a2('bum): la la zhig rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po blta bar 'tshol nas/de rgya mtsho chen po blta 'tshal ba'i slad du de ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po dang /nye bar mchis pa de lto de
524a3('bum): ltar ldum bu'am ldum du'i mtshan ma'am/ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma mthong na/des 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po thab nye ste/'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ring po med do//de
524a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe nu/rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol ba ste/'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i drung du da ni ring po med do//de dang nye ba ni nI ldum bu 'am ldum bu'i mtshan ma
524a5('bum): 'am ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma gang yang med do//zhes bgyi bar rig par bgyi'o//de ltar skyes bu de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang des bdag ni rgya
524a6('bum): mtsho chen po dang nye bar gyur to//rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di na yod do rgya mtsho chen po ni 'dra phan chad mi ring ngo zhes bgyi bar rtogs par 'tshal to//bcom ldan 'das de
524a7('bum): bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /'chang zhing klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
524b1('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/khyod bsgral pa ni 'di snyed
524b2('bum): cig/bskal pa brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig/bskal pa stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig/bskal pa brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig/bskal pa bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong gi

524b4('bum): tu lung bstan pas/da dung lung ma bstan gyis kyang bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nye bar gnas par blta'o//de ci'i slad du zhe
524b5('bum): na/da ni 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur du yod la mnyan du yod do//thos nas kyang bzung du
524b6('bum): yod do//btsang du yod klag tu yod/kun chub par byar yod/tshul bzhin du yid la byar yod do zhes bgyi bar reg par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper
524b7('bum): na/dpyid kyi dus la bab ste rtsi shing gi lo ma dang 'dab ma lhags nas kha dog gyur pa'i tshe//dzam+bu gling gi mi rnams kyis ring po mi thogs par lo me dang me tog dang 'bras
525a1('bum): zla 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo//de ci'i slad du zhe na/da ni 'di ltar stu ltas 'di dag rtsi shing las snang ngo zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar 'gro ste/gangag

525a3('bum): ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas nyams bde bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

525b6('bum): lus 'gyur te/de lta de ltar slar zhing lus ngal la rgyud zhan cing mi dga' la kha zas yi ger mi mchi zhing rmugs pa dang gnyid kyang chung ngur 'gyur te/nyams mi bde ba dus
525b7('bum): smra ba nyung zhing bsten pa'i ngang tshul ma mchis la sngon tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i yid la bgyid pa bsten pa dang /bsnyen pa des rnam pa de lta bu'i tsher ba myong bar 'gyur te//
526a1('bum): /dang me gzhan dag gos thang ma tshan mad+hi dzAltar mthong ba ltas 'du med 'don dang por mi thogs par bya nga 'gyur mnas ba

526b1('bum): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar legs par yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshur che'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
526b2('bum): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /lha dang mo'i

526b5('bum): mthun par spyod pa ste de dag gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lom la yang dag par skul lo//bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la/gzhon yang bsam
526b6('bum): gtan dang po la yang dag par skul la//bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug la/gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul lo///

528a1('bum): rang byang chub mngon du mi byed do//bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol/

528b1('bum): kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed la/gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo//bdag kyang sems can yongs su smin

529b2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom la/gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul lo//bdag kyang rnam par thar

530a4('bum): nyid thob par byed la/gzhani yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo//bdag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs po thams
530a5('bum): cad rab tu spong la/gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la yang dag par skul lo//bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo
530a6('bum): bskor la/gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba la yang dag par skul lo//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan
530a7('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan mang po dang ldan pa de dag sems can thams cad kyi slad du/
530b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to//bde
530b2('bum): bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su
530b3('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
530b4('bum): pa'i tshe/nam gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
530b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam tshor ba'o 'phel ba yang
530b6('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab
530b7('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam 'du shes kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe//
531a1('bum): nga chub skyenas dpa sem sa 'dzin du shes rab kya tshul na rgyun pa sgom pa yongs su rtogs par gyur //rab 'byor byung chu so nga/
531a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa 'i chen po shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa lce spyod pa'i tshe/nam 'du byed kyi 'phelta ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de \u0f7f/ze rnas

531a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam par shes pa'i 'phel bya yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

531a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pa la tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'ing/
531b1('bum): ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor

538a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub
538a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'phel ba yang dag
538a6('bum): par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
538a7('bum): 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nem shes rab kyi pha rol tu
538b1('bum): phyin pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
538b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam nang
538b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
538b4('bum): paM yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam phyi
538b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa bsgom
538b6('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam phyi
538b7('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
539a1('bum): bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
539a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/nam stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
539a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
539a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nA ma chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems

539a6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i tshe/nam don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag pararo rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems
539a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
539b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub

539b3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems

539b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
539b6('bum): chen po'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
539b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag pa ri rjeso su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

540a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong po de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

542a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems

542b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs

543b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems

543b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes

543b5('bum): snying rje chen po'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
543b6('bum): par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'phel
543b7('bum): ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor

544a2('bum): par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rab
544a3('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/namu lom gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su

544a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nom rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su
544a6('bum): ma mthong ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//zhus dag
